shape_3_per_frame1=r=q8;
shape_3_per_frame2=g=q7;
shape_3_per_frame3=b=q6;
shape_3_per_frame4=
shape_3_per_frame5=r2=r;
shape_3_per_frame6=g2=g;
shape_3_per_frame7=b2=b;
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.3) + 0.4*sin(0.98*time));
per_frame_2=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.1) + 0.4*sin(0.78*time));
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.2) + 0.4*sin(0.6*time));
per_frame_4=q8=wave_r;
per_frame_5=q7=wave_b;
per_frame_6=q6=wave_g;
per_frame_7=warp=0;
per_frame_8=vol = 0.1*(vol*9 + (bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.333333);
per_frame_9=q1=vol*3;
per_frame_10=q1=0.5;
per_frame_11=q3=vol;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=q2=q1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float3 rc = lerp(float3(0,0,0), float3(0,1,0), uv.y);
warp_4=`    uv = 0.5 + (uv-0.5)*(1-(rc.y*0.02));  
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    float3 boxave = (GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*q2,uv.y+texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_7=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*q2,uv.y+texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_8=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*q2,uv.y-texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_9=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*q2,uv.y-texsize.w*q2)) ) / 4;
warp_10=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
warp_11=`   
warp_12=`    ret = cross(boxave, 1-saturate(ret-GetBlur1(uv)))*2;    
warp_13=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`    float3 boxave = (GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*q1,uv.y+texsize.w*q1)) +
comp_5=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*q1,uv.y+texsize.w*q1)) +
comp_6=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*q1,uv.y-texsize.w*q1)) +
comp_7=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*q1,uv.y-texsize.w*q1)) ) /4;
comp_8=`float3 reta = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
comp_9=`reta = cross(boxave, reta)*2;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`ret = lum(reta+boxave);
comp_12=`ret = reflect(ret, lum(reta-0.35));
comp_13=`ret = lerp(ret*float3(q6,q8,q7), ret*float3(q8,q7,q6), uv.y);
comp_14=`ret*=5;
comp_15=`}
